name: UK General Knowledge [2] Quiz | General | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Opinion pollsters.

	They are opinion polling and market research companies.

questions.text: In 2001, Australia beat England at cricket for the Ashes - for how many times in a row?
questions.explanation:
7.

	Regrettably, for the seventh time in a row!

questions.text: Who were the final candidates for the 2001 Conservative leadership election?
questions.correct: Iain Duncan Smith and Kenneth Clarke
options: Iain Duncan Smith and Michael Portillo
questions.explanation:
Iain Duncan Smith and Kenneth Clarke.

	Michael Portillo and Michael Ancram were eliminated in earlier rounds of the contest.

questions.text: Which TV series is the odd one out?
questions.explanation:
Hearts and Bones.

	Despite its name 'Hearts and Bones' is NOT a hospital-based drama, unlike the others.

questions.text: What West End (London) musical included Denise Van Outen and Alison Moyet among its cast?
questions.explanation:
Chicago.

	They are both in 'Chicago.' Elaine Page was originally in 'Cats,' Martin McCutcheon stars in 'My Fair Lady' and Barbara Dickson was the original star of 'Blood Brothers.'

questions.text: Which TV soap went from 3 to 4 nights a week in 2001?
questions.explanation:
EastEnders.

	EastEnders goes out four nights a week, on Monday, Tuesday, Thursday and Friday evenings, with an omnibus edition on Sundays.

questions.text: What does the TSB in Lloyds TSB stand for?
questions.explanation:
Trustee Savings Bank.

	TSB stands for Trustee Savings Bank, a former mutual that became a commercial bank and then merged with Lloyds.

Black Horse.

	The Black Horse was the symbol used by Lloyds. Barclays used the Eagle.

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT a UK University?
questions.explanation:
Huntingdon.

	Robert Gordon University is in Aberdeen, London Guildhall University is in central London, De Montfort University is based in Leicester with sites across the east midlands.

questions.text: As of summer 2001, how many of the Spice Girls are married?
questions.explanation:
1 & One.

	Victoria 'Posh Spice' is still married to David Beckham. Mel C 'Sporty', Geri 'Ginger' and Emma Bunton 'Baby' are single, despite false rumours of Emma's marriage this year. Mel B 'Scary' is divorced.
